p:
The accumulation of MDA because of lipid peroxidation was assessed by the Thiobarbituric acid (TBA) according to Wang et al.
27 and was calculated on a fresh weight basis, using the following formula:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$(nmol\cdot \cdot MDA\cdot {g}^{-1}\cdot FW)=6.54(OD532-OD600)-0.56(OD450)\times 1000$$\end{document}
(
n m o l ⋅ ⋅ M D A ⋅
g
− 1
⋅ F W
)
= 6.54 ( O D 532 − O D 600 ) − 0.56 ( O D 450 ) × 1000
